Early Education for Eligible 2 Year Olds

Apply for early education: step 5 of 6

Additional Criteria

If you are not eligible based on the financial criteria, your child may still qualify for early education. Please tell us if any of the following apply to you:

Is your child in the care of the Local Authority or in Kinship Care where they remain living with their extended family or friendship network?
Has your child left care but are not able to return home (through adoption orders, residence orders or special guardianship)?
Is your child from an asylum seeking refugee family / traveller family?
Is your child subject to a Child Protection Plan?
Does your child have a disability / Special Educational Needs Support Plan?
Is your family involved with Social Care or parent involved with Drug and Alcohol Services?
